text:
Since 4.1.24 my App work sometimes wrong. The App use a zip-outputstream and in 
nearly all time it work fine. But from time to time the client browser (IE 5.5 
or greater) shows the HTML Code as plain text (a reload of the side let this 
gone away and the HTML Code will be proper interpreted). So, this is not easy 
to demonstrate... Any suggestions? 

TED
creator: ted@gmx.li
remm@apache.org
text:
This is not a bug report. You need to identify some specific problem in Tomcat
causing the wrong behavior, or at least provide something reproduceable.
tomcat-user is a better place than BZ to get support on that kind of issues, or
for more investigation (and you'll be able to find out if other people are
experiencing similar problems).
